channel.title: [DELTA] Smithing not smelting
channel.description: Well the code is looks half assed but it works fine, it's just that so much stuff was ripped, so dont hate about the code. The things that are already smithable are -dagger -sword -longsword -scimitar -2h The exp and level requirement its like real rs, if you wanna add the other items, just fill the enum, if somone finishes the enum i hope that he posts back as im lazy to finish filling the enum. http://pastebin.com/Bj9HWg1q

item.title: [DELTA] Smithing not smelting
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

you don’t need instance per player, also create constants for emote and item ids. lastly, use configs instead of a new void for every armour type

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] Smithing not smelting
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

use floats for your xp’s. in reality, the xp in all rsps should be a float, it is just floored for display to client.

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] Smithing not smelting
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

Well the code is looks half assed but it works fine, it’s just that so much stuff was ripped, so dont hate about the code.
The things that are already smithable are
-dagger
-sword
-longsword
-scimitar
-2h
The exp and level requirement its like real rs, if you wanna add the other items, just fill the enum, if somone finishes the enum i hope that he posts back as im lazy to finish filling the enum.
http://pastebin.com/Bj9HWg1q

Read full topic
